name: test_e2e_with_logs[323_CMD_BASH_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BASH_005` |
| **Name** | Path environment variable access |
| **Category** | CMDI |
| **Subcategory** | bash_specific |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `&& bash -c 'echo $PATH'`
- **Encoded**: `%26%26%20bash%20-c%20%27echo%20%24PATH%27`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~42000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:36:35.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|

| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_BASH_005-1772192195138-d6t34f pattern_id=CMD_BASH_005 uri=/?q=%26%26%20bash%20-c%20%27echo%20%24PATH%27 client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
